verses.text: \w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w take|strong="H2620"\w* \w refuge|strong="H2620"\w*.
